åŸå¸‚ï¼šäº¬éƒ½
ç”»é£ï¼šæµ®ä¸–ç»˜
ç­¾åï¼šAztecaAlpaca

Aspect Ratio: 4:3
Prompt:
An appropriate art tool (e.g., a brush, palette knife, stylus, or traditional implement suited to the [Painting Style]), seemingly in the act of creating, traces a fine, elegant curve from the lower left to the upper right. Within the stroke are miniature landscapes of famous [City/Country] landmarks: a selection of iconic sites, blending historic and modern architecture, natural features, and urban life specific to the location. The overall style is a combination of [Painting Style] and academic poster design: varying strokes and marks create a sense of three-dimensionality, with 3D miniature landscapes and a bas-relief texture. [Dominant Color Tones] dominate, with traditional [City/Country] aesthetics interspersed with the modern skyline. The image is a minimalist top-down view, with large areas of open space outside the main stroke. The background is a textured paper (high-quality fiber texture) in a bright, clean, and refreshing hue (e.g., pure white, vibrant sky blue, sunny light yellow, or clean mint green) that contrasts cleanly with the artwork and creates a pristine feel. The overall design blends traditional [City/Country] aesthetics with modern three-dimensional art, featuring high detail, hyper-realism, HDR, and 8K resolution.
Poster text requires master-level typography (exquisite grid, precise spacing control, extremely accurate letter spacing and hierarchy), with all fonts rendered in a style that visually complements and integrates with the chosen [Painting Style] and tool:
Main title: "[CITY/COUNTRY]" (Artistic font matching the painting style's aesthetic, very eye-catching, high contrast, key visual level)
Subtitle: "[Subtitle about the location's character]" (Masterful typography in a complementary style to the main title and painting texture)
Decorative copy (all in a font style integrated with the [Painting Style], segmented to create rhythm and hierarchy with the headline):
"[Decorative Copy 1: e.g., Name of a river or natural feature]"
"[Decorative Copy 2: A phrase describing the city's atmosphere]"
"[Decorative Copy 3: Name of a district or landmark]"
"[Decorative Copy 4: A concluding thought about the city]"
Small text in the top left corner: [signature/brand name] (in a subtle, matching font style)
In very small print at the bottom right corner: [Signature/brand name] (in a subtle, matching font style)
Composition requirements: The tool's tip should stop at the end of the stroke (upper right), leaving clean open space outside the stroke; the miniature landscape exists only within the stroke, with dense details but not cluttered;
